original_text: All the people there agreed that this was a good idea. They realized that it was the right thing to do.
korean_text: 뭇 백성의 눈이 이 일을 좋게 여기므로 온 회중이 그대로 행하겠다 한지라

sentences.original_text: that this was a good idea
that it was the right thing to do
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 해야 할 올바른 일이라는 것을
